actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to require the Federal Government to purchase fuel efficient automobiles, and for other purposes.
short_title: Government Fleet Fuel Economy Act of 2007

summary.text: Government Fleet Fuel Economy Act of 2007 - Amends provisions relating to standards for executive agency automobiles to require each passenger vehicle purchased, or leased for at least 60 consecutive days, by an executive agency after enactment of this Act to be as fuel efficient as possible.

titles.title: Government Fleet Fuel Economy Act of 2007
A bill to require the Federal Government to purchase fuel efficient automobiles, and for other purposes.
